website_summaries.verdict: The perfect compact tackle bag for use on short fishing trips when you don't need all of your gear.
pros: Good storage capacity for its size
cons: It may be too small for you if you have a lot of gear

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag!! I had to deduct two stars because it did not come with a shoulder strap or a coiled lanyard with carabiners. I removed the three plastic storage bins it came with and replaced them with three Plano Worm Stowaway 3700 to keep my worms organized as this will be my dedicated worm bag.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Nice Tacle set for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.text: The soft tackle case is what expected and the Berkeley tacklebox are pretty decent for all around use. The Berkeley tackle boxes are not of the best quality, eventually the snaps will break off with extended use. Other than that: I bought it for a purpose and it serves that purpose well.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: By far the best value!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have looked in person at the comparable tackle bags and they are more than double the price. I guess it is because it is branded and we make ourselves a billboard for Powerbait, but I am ok with that. love the bag!!!
customer_reviews.author: Fredstrong

customer_reviews.title: Top of bag is not zip opening.
customer_reviews.text: The zipper opening for the plastic tray organizers is actually the side of the bag, not the top. You have to lay it on its side to have the top open, then the side pouches are turned 90* and supplies and tackle fall out of them. I purchased a Plano with the zippered top and I am much happier.
customer_reviews.author: Addison Moroz

customer_reviews.title: Good product but just normal soft tackle case
customer_reviews.text: I’m just getting back into trout fishing again and seen this soft bag with Powerbait label. The boxes inside seemed to represent that each compartment will hold a jar of power bait for organization purposes and that’s not the case. These are just normal size boxes for everyday gear and not jars. Had the included boxes held powerbait it would be an awesome deal. I am happy with the overall product and seems durable but haven’t used it yet.
customer_reviews.author: William taden

customer_reviews.title: My son loves his new tackle bag
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat the price of this bag. Seems to be good quality material and already has your hard cases inside.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great bag...came broken
customer_reviews.text: This bag is awesome. Seems durable and has plenty of storage. I would recommend it for sure. But....it came broken, one of the plastic boxes was smashed, a metal ring was ripped of strap and there is a small puncture in the bag from the broken ring. I reached out to Berkley to see if they can help me out.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Compact design with lots of storage!
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag. It's a little smaller than my current tackle bag but has lots of storage for everything I need. It is comfy enough to wade with which is a big plus for me. The jar holder is a nice little touch. Plus it's safety yellow so it' hard to forget. The one reviewer that said he didn't get a shoulder strap probably just didn't look hard enough. It was in the front compartment and as always the last place I looked. Overall very please and can't wait to get out on the water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like the product. I should have purchased a larger size but it’s my fault for underestimating what I needed. I have take. It in many trips and it has held up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Miano

customer_reviews.title: Great for the essentials
customer_reviews.text: Use it in my kayak. Perfect size for all I need. I use the two cases for lures and the extra space if for plastics and small case of hook, swivels, small weights, etc. Pockets are great for multi-tool, scale, gloves,etc.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Billingham

customer_reviews.title: ... large and you'll have everything you need for a good day of fishing and more
customer_reviews.text: Get the large and you'll have everything you need for a good day of fishing and more. There are enough pockets to help you find a home for all your extras too. It's a very nice upgrade from the box I had, and the shoulder strap makes it easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Ok if you don't need to carry much...
customer_reviews.text: When I got this, I purchased the large size and was not able to put in all my lures, swivels, fishing tools, etc that I want to carry on me when salt water lure fishing. I had to go to a local pro shop to find what I wanted and need in size. I'm gonna keep this tackle bag, but I'll primarily use it when I got out occasionally fresh water fishing or ice fishing.
customer_reviews.author: polafication

customer_reviews.title: Very Durable
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tackle bag you can get for your buck. - Really durable, thick material - Perfect amount of pockets - 4 Organizers included in the box! (Usually the organizers cost just as much!) - Keeps it’s square shape and doesn’t sag
customer_reviews.author: Nikita Smirnov

customer_reviews.title: nice bag, bad storage
customer_reviews.text: The bag seems like good quality. But the storage trays are useless for anything small, like hooks. Hooks and small thin things will work their way out of the box and into the bag by just walking. Called their customer support and they offered no solution. I am pretty sure this is my first 1 star Amazon review.
customer_reviews.author: S. Loveland

customer_reviews.title: Initially I liked this bag
customer_reviews.text: Initially I liked this bag. It was amazing how much stuff I could carry in it. But, it started falling apart at the seam last month (June}, I didn't overload it. The compartment that started falling apart was used for three small packages of hooks. Now I see that it was made in China, nothing more to say.
customer_reviews.author: Brad B. Jaquette

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Tackle Bag!
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered a ton of things from FFO and needed a new bag. For the price, the size of the bag was absolutely perfect, it is very very well made. The company was great, customer service was excellent, and delivery was fast. I highly recommend this for ANY fisher of any age.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Nice little piece of gear.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a box to put all my bass gear in and this one didn't disappoint me. Three plastic boxes for lures that have moveable dividers for different size lures, some pockets, some clips, nice gear. Worked well for what I wanted it for. No problems with shipping or seller. All good.
customer_reviews.author: forktail

customer_reviews.title: Small, but full of options
customer_reviews.text: Great gift! He can’t wait to take it out full of gear!
customer_reviews.author: Edwin

customer_reviews.title: Good grab and go bag with just the right amount of features
customer_reviews.text: Perfect small bag for heading down to the bank or having a ready to go bag to grab to jump in someone else’s boat. Good pocket variety. Seems durable so far after being fully loaded and used multiple times.
customer_reviews.author: T. Tanaka

customer_reviews.title: I've had this tackle bag for years now and it ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this tackle bag for years now and it has held up well. Not a single rip or tear in it, knock on wood. Has plenty of space to carry the tackle I'm going to use and pockets for all the miscellaneous pliers and everything else.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag!
customer_reviews.text: Great tackle bag! Plenty of room. The three plastic tackle boxes are light weight and, so far, have held up well. Stores everything I need and the shoulder strap leaves a hand free when hiking to fishing spots. Larger than I imagined and great for the weekend fisherman.
customer_reviews.author: Xarkzila

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great. I was concerned when I ordered it because it is so cheap. I have had it for a few months now, and I love it. Its well made, and despite the description, it fits four tackle trays, not three. The jar-holder on the outside is cool too. It holds bait jars very securely.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: stitching defective fell apart after 3 weeks of light use. berkley sending a replacement. update: replacement also fell apart after a few weeks light use. conclusion JUNK !!
customer_reviews.author: Mookie

customer_reviews.title: Crappie Bag
customer_reviews.text: Great fishing bag for all of my crappie gear & lures. Well made, lightweight and well constructed. Do recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SonnyR

customer_reviews.title: It's a really nice bag. The only thing I don't like about ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a really nice bag. The only thing I don't like about it is how small the tray compartments are. Those are cheap to replace if you want.
customer_reviews.author: Griff973

customer_reviews.title: This a great bag
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of trout fishing and this can handle everything I own which is a lot of stuff the straps on the top even hold my tripod chair this bag is a great product all around, I would recommend this product to anyone
customer_reviews.author: joseph bintz

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for the price
customer_reviews.text: Really great bag for my 8 year old son. The only problem we had was the clip for the arm strap came broken.. and they don't sell just the replacement strap.
customer_reviews.author: Gingersnap717

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tackle bag with multiple compartments and dividers to keep bait seperated and organized!
customer_reviews.author: Bamagirl

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: very nice, lots of pockets and plenty of room for all my fishing tackle
customer_reviews.author: Carole

customer_reviews.title: the bag has nice features but the zipper broke and now I can't ...
customer_reviews.text: the bag has nice features but the zipper broke and now I can't secure my tackle to bad I waited to return it ,now the return window is closed
customer_reviews.author: michael travis

customer_reviews.title: Work great.
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. Using it for my freshwater tackle.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: perfect for traveling
customer_reviews.text: perfect for traveling. However, you can find this in stores for much cheaper. But overall quality is good, and comes with storage cases.
customer_reviews.author: Nick T.

customer_reviews.title: Fresh water fishing (bass and trout)
customer_reviews.text: I fish for many different fresh water species in my local rivers and lakes, from both the bank,kayak and scanoe, this bag allows me to keep everything separate and organized, there is enough room in the bag to add another case, which I did. It was cheaper than any i could find available locally and with the fast shipping I had it before my next fishing adventure.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kayak fishing
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one that I have purchased and for a good reason. It light weight and durable. I use it when out with the kids and it fits perfectly on my Kayak.
customer_reviews.author: O. Morales

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bag
customer_reviews.text: Great tackle box for quick on the go use. Has a lot of room for plenty of baits and other gear in side compartments. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jared Fremin

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Was missing the shoulder strap. Disappointed! Needed to use at a tournament so no time to return and reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Reed

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. I bought it for my 10 year old's birthday. Well made, not as small as I thought it would be. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Devon

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag lots of storage and the containers are very large aith alot of compartments. Definately my favorite bag from my favorite company
customer_reviews.author: kelley rea

customer_reviews.title: She has it very organized and it looks great too.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a friend and she loves it. She uses all the time and it is easier to carry around than a hard case. She has it very organized and it looks great too.
customer_reviews.author: J. Robison

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag!
customer_reviews.text: This Bag had all the storage I need. You can actually fit 3 trays, but it only comes with 2. Awesome purchase, especially for the low price!
customer_reviews.author: janus020781

customer_reviews.title: Gone fishing !!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: very nice tackle box. has plenty of pockets for your fishing needs. comes with 3 trays and seems to be of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: SCFROMWI

customer_reviews.title: Bag
customer_reviews.text: Bag is nice and big to fit a lot of fishing gears three trays and you can carry it much better than a box
customer_reviews.author: Grandma

customer_reviews.title: I do love it.....But..
customer_reviews.text: It's a great bag. It really is! I love it! It is a bit bigger than I was expecting. I don't have that much tackle and likely would have gone for the medium, but hey, now I have a reason to get more STUFF!!!! :)
customer_reviews.author: A. McCracken-Barber

customer_reviews.title: Great bags
customer_reviews.text: I loved it so much I now hav two medium and two large
customer_reviews.author: Ronald laymance

customer_reviews.title: It came quicker than expected and was great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my bro for christmas. It came quicker than expected and was great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Awall

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price
customer_reviews.text: Have used for a season and holds all my gear. Got a great price, and will buy another when needed
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD F.

customer_reviews.title: nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: it is a nice bag for the price. the plastic organizers that come with it are cheap. the shoulder strap was also missing
customer_reviews.author: opinions are like A_ _ holes

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: Great bag... big enough to hold everything, small enough to tote easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Lots of storage. Just as advertised. Would definitely recommend this bag. Good quality product at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: JWD

customer_reviews.title: the rite purchase
customer_reviews.text: only three boxes?????takes 4,i like this unit,its just rite for what i need side access is realy good thank you
customer_reviews.author: Arlie Bearden

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Great bag, lots of room for all the "toys" my hubby packs away for his fishing adventures. It did take 3 weeks to arrive and the box looked as if it was kicked around the mail room for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Saylor

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bag, larger than expected built well
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bag, larger than expected built well. Quick shipping
customer_reviews.author: James p cornelison jr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great grandson was very happy as it was his birthday present.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: for my grandson
customer_reviews.text: Has plastic trays. very versatile. I think he will love it. would recommend for any young fisherman. Put some baits in it.
customer_reviews.author: James Naumann

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for jump-fishing in hip boots along the shoreline w/ species specific tackle.
customer_reviews.author: Buck50

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Nice solid made bag.. Feels and looks like it should cost more
customer_reviews.author: David P.

customer_reviews.title: do not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my son two months ago, very limited use, and it is already falling apart. workmanship is substandard; zippr is breaking, come unsewn, fabric is not water proof. amazon only has a 30 day return policy
customer_reviews.author: bigski

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for a quick fish. Very light and will carry everything you need for walking around a lake or pond.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bag.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bag... when I received it one of the trays was broken. The bag is plenty big and set up perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Nate J.

customer_reviews.title: Great fishing bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag. It provides lots of storage and its light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Khouri M.

customer_reviews.title: good not great
customer_reviews.text: Its an ok bag. The tackle trays are what bother me. They are very cheap and flimsy. Other than that its a nice bag. Its very nice to sling my tackle over the shoulder.
customer_reviews.author: Zepp

customer_reviews.title: Hubby Loves It
customer_reviews.text: Got this as an anniversary gift for my husband, and he LOVES it. He's actually thinking about ordering another one so he can separate his salt water and fresh water gadgets. Excellent bag, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Great tackle bag.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality bag.Well made nice refreshing color also.Includes 3 plastic trays.Great price too! Highly recommend for the avid fisherman etc.
customer_reviews.author: snooker3

customer_reviews.title: handy size
customer_reviews.text: bag arrived and seems like good all round quality product. handy size as the bigger the bag, the more stuff you carry, heavier it all is...... fits every thing i need inside and value for money. happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Selwyn

customer_reviews.title: nice bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag was very good and was largerer then expected all my tackle fit in it with one draw back no room for a spinner bait box but a very nice bag over all
customer_reviews.author: wallywood

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tackle Bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great and goes with all my other berkley products because and its easy to carrie around when fishing.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Nice, great
customer_reviews.text: I use it for every trip for fishing. Nice, great, size is perfect. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Bently chen

customer_reviews.title: Great tackle bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag seems like it has a bit of everything and appears well worth the price I paid for it. I got it to be my 11 year old son's first tackle bag and plan to fill it full of gear for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: jac2

customer_reviews.title: Great tackle bag!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, holds all my tackle and then some. Was looking for a change from the solid plastic tackle boxes and this was a nice choice. Price was good and delivery fast.
customer_reviews.author: Gary H.

customer_reviews.title: Like it!
customer_reviews.text: Stylish, plenty of room and comes with three plastic storage trays for lures, hooks, etc. Lightweight and seems sturdy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Skiwee

customer_reviews.title: tackle bag
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Can fit one more box (the size it comes with) so you can have 4 boxes inside. Its great.
customer_reviews.author: Denis

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: This bag is ugly as hell but it is nice light has all I need for basic fishing and is all around good quality and the fish dont seem to mind that the bag is ugly.
customer_reviews.author: Energy drink guru

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: I bough this back for my girlfriend for creek fishing she doesn't enjoy wearing the fishing vest. So this small over the shoulder pack will work out well for walking the creeks and lakes.
customer_reviews.author: Zack

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and it is better than I expected. This is a must have and will not get left behind because the color will not be missed.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Gomane

customer_reviews.title: ripped
customer_reviews.text: Bottom of bag in ripped open. Very disoppinting . This was a gift for a friend on mine . I won't be able to give it to him in this condition
customer_reviews.author: cj

product_meta.title: Berkley Powerbait Tackle Bag
product_meta.description: Keep your baits handy with the Berkley® PowerBait® tackle bag! Three tackle trays (included) fit inside the padded interior, and zippered front and side pockets store smaller accessories. A removable, padded shoulder strap and jar bait sling are included.
feature_bullets: Removable padded shoulder strap and jar bait Sling included
3 tackle trays (10.75" x 7.25" x 1.75")One coiled lanyard with carabinersOne jar bait sling with carabiner (bait not included)Adjustable bungee strap for extra storage

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
